StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetOssAc.vi.es]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Recrui.ngPersonId uniqueidentifier = null, @StartDate date.me, @EndDate date.me, @OrgId int = null
AS
BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
CREATE TABLE #ACTIVITIES ( Ac.vity VARCHAR(10) )
CREATE TABLE #RESULTS ( ActType VARCHAR(10) ,ContactCount INT ,ContactCount_Female INT ,AppCount INT ,AppCount_Female INT ,IntviewCount INT ,IntviewCount_Female INT ,NwaCount INT ,NwaCount_Female INT ,ContactCountAA INT ,ContactCountAA_Female INT ,AppCountAA INT ,AppCountAA_Female INT ,IntviewCountAA INT ,IntviewCountAA_Female INT ,NwaCountAA INT ,NwaCountAA_Female INT ,ContactCountWhite INT ,ContactCountWhite_Female INT ,AppCountWhite INT ,AppCountWhite_Female INT ,IntviewCountWhite INT ,IntviewCountWhite_Female INT ,NwaCountWhite INT ,NwaCountWhite_Female INT ,ContactCountH INT ,ContactCountH_Female INT ,AppCountH INT ,AppCountH_Female INT ,IntviewCountH INT ,IntviewCountH_Female INT ,NwaCountH INT ,NwaCountH_Female INT ,ContactCountO INT ,ContactCountO_Female INT ,AppCountO INT ,AppCountO_Female INT ,IntviewCountO INT ,IntviewCountO_Female INT ,NwaCountO INT ,NwaCountO_Female INT )
CREATE TABLE #PROSPECT_DIVERSITY ( ProspectId UNIQUEIDENTIFIER ,Ac.vity VARCHAR(10) ,Ac.vityDate DATETIME ,NwaId UNIQUEIDENTIFIER ,DiversityCode VARCHAR(10) ,Gender varchar(1) ,SocialSecurityNumber char(9) ,Program varchar(4) )
SET @StartDate = CAST( (STR(Year(@StartDate)) + '-' + STR(MONTH(@StartDate)) + '-' + STR(DAY(@StartDate)) ) AS date.me)
SET @EndDate = CAST( (STR(Year(@EndDate)) + '-' + STR(MONTH(@EndDate)) + '-' + STR(DAY(@EndDate)) ) AS date.me) SET @EndDate = DATEADD(day, 1, @EndDate)
INSERT INTO #ACTIVITIES SELECT 'TC'
INSERT INTO #ACTIVITIES SELECT 'DC'
INSERT INTO #ACTIVITIES SELECT 'AC'
INSERT INTO #ACTIVITIES SELECT 'OT'
declare @StartCompDate date.me if (month(@StartDate) > 9) select @StartCompDate = convert(date.me, '10/1/' + cast(year(@StartDate) as varchar(4))) else select @StartCompDate = convert(date.me, '10/1/' + cast(year(@StartDate)-1 as varchar(4)))
--print @StartCompDate
SELECT P.* INTO #Prospect FROM PROSPECTING.USMC.PROSPECT P INNER JOIN MCRISS.DBO.RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION RO ON RO.ROWGUID = P.Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId AND RO.Organiza.on_Id = @OrgId
SELECT * INTO #Event FROM RSSOSS.USMC.Event e WHERE @OrgId IS NOT NULL AND e.Organiza.onId = @OrgId AND (e.StartDate >= @StartDate AND e.StartDate < @EndDate)
--select * from #Event
SELECT DISTINCT s.*, startdate, eventypeid INTO #EventSubject FROM RSSOSS.USMC.EventSubject s INNER JOIN #Event e ON e.ID = s.EventId
SELECT * INTO #Event2 FROM RSSOSS.USMC.Event e WHERE @OrgId IS NOT NULL AND e.Organiza.onId = @OrgId AND (e.StartDate >= @StartCompDate AND e.StartDate < @EndDate)
--select * from #Event2
SELECT DISTINCT s.*, startdate, eventypeid INTO #EventSubject2 FROM RSSOSS.USMC.EventSubject s INNER JOIN #Event2 e ON e.ID = s.EventId
--select * from #EventSubject2 order by Subjec.d
SELECT DISTINCT oc.* INTO #EventOutcome FROM RSSOSS.USMC.EventOutcome oc INNER JOIN #Event e ON e.ID = oc.EventId
INSERT INTO #PROSPECT_DIVERSITY SELECT pro.ProspectId ,pro.Ac.vity ,pro.Ac.vityDate ,pro.NwaId ,CASE WHEN opp.Diversity IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN (per.Race + per.Ethnicity) IN ('AA', 'C1','C2','C3','C4','C5','C6','C7','C9','CA','CB','CD','CE','CF','CG','CH','CJ', 'CK','CL','CP','CQ','CS','CT','CV','CW','CZ', 'EA','FA') THEN 'AA' WHEN (per.Race + per.Ethnicity) IN ('A4','A6','A9','AB','AS','BB','DB','E1','E4','E6','E9','EB','ES','F1','F4','F6', 'F9','FB','FS') THEN 'H' WHEN (per.Race + per.Ethnicity) IN ('EP','EZ','FP','FZ') THEN 'W' WHEN (per.Race + per.Ethnicity) IN ('A1','A2','A3','A5','A7','AD','AE','AF','AG','AH','AJ','AK','AL','AP','AQ','AT','AV','AW','AZ', 'B1','B2','B3','B4','B5','B6','B7','B9','BA', 'D1','D2','D3','D4','D5','D6','D7','D9','DA', 'BD','BE','BF','BG','BH','BJ','BK','BL','BP','BQ','BS','BT','BV','BW','BZ', 'DD','DE','DF','DG','DH','DJ','DK','DL','DP','DQ','DS','DT','DV','DW','DZ', 'E2','E3','E5','E7','ED','EE','EF','EG','EH','EJ','EK','EL','EQ','ET','EV','EW', 'F2','F3','F5','F7','FD','FE','FF','FG','FH','FJ','FK','FL','FQ','FT','FV','FW' ) THEN 'O' ELSE NULL END ELSE CASE WHEN (opp.Diversity + opp.EthnicCode) IN ('AA', 'C1','C2','C3','C4','C5','C6','C7','C9','CA','CB','CD','CE','CF','CG','CH','CJ', 'CK','CL','CP','CQ','CS','CT','CV','CW','CZ', 'EA','FA') THEN 'AA' WHEN (opp.Diversity + opp.EthnicCode) IN ('A4','A6','A9','AB','AS','BB','DB','E1','E4','E6','E9','EB','ES','F1','F4','F6', 'F9','FB','FS') THEN 'H' WHEN (opp.Diversity + opp.EthnicCode) IN ('EP','EZ','FP','FZ') THEN 'W' WHEN (opp.Diversity + opp.EthnicCode) IN ('A1','A2','A3','A5','A7','AD','AE','AF','AG','AH','AJ','AK','AL','AP','AQ','AT','AV','AW','AZ', 'B1','B2','B3','B4','B5','B6','B7','B9','BA', 'D1','D2','D3','D4','D5','D6','D7','D9','DA', 'BD','BE','BF','BG','BH','BJ','BK','BL','BP','BQ','BS','BT','BV','BW','BZ', 'DD','DE','DF','DG','DH','DJ','DK','DL','DP','DQ','DS','DT','DV','DW','DZ', 'E2','E3','E5','E7','ED','EE','EF','EG','EH','EJ','EK','EL','EQ','ET','EV','EW', 'F2','F3','F5','F7','FD','FE','FF','FG','FH','FJ','FK','FL','FQ','FT','FV','FW' ) THEN 'O' ELSE NULL END END AS DiversityCode ,per.Gender ,per.SocialSecurityNumber ,opp.Program FROM #Prospect pro LEFT OUTER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.O.cerProspectPac opp ON pro.ProspectId = opp.ProspectId INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.Person per ON pro.PersonId = per.PersonId
-- get rid of duplicated interviews
SELECT rst.* INTO #EventSubjectInt FROM ( ( -- for applicants with SSN SELECT es1.*, p.Ac.vity, p.Gender, p.DiversityCode, p.NwaId FROM #EventSubject es1 INNER JOIN #PROSPECT_DIVERSITY p ON es1.subjectId = p.ProspectId INNER JOIN #ACTIVITIES a ON a.Ac.vity = p.Ac.vity INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventOutcome oc on es1.EventId = oc.EventId WHERE oc.InterviewOutcomeId IN (1,2) AND StartDate = ( SELECT min(es2.StartDate) FROM #EventSubject2 es2 INNER JOIN #PROSPECT_DIVERSITY p2 on es2.subjectId = p2.ProspectId INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventOutcome oc2 on es2.EventId = oc2.EventId WHERE p.SocialSecurityNumber= p2.SocialSecurityNumber and es2.startDate between @StartCompDate and @EndDate and Program in ('0A', '0B', '0C', '0E', '0F', '1A', '1B', '1C', '1H') and es1.eventypeid = es2.eventypeid and oc2.InterviewOutcomeId IN (1,2) and es1.EventId in ( SELECT id FROM #Event WHERE eventypeid in (1,85,88) ) ) AND Program in ('0A', '0B', '0C', '0E', '0F', '1A', '1B', '1C', '1H')
UNION
-- for applicants without SSN SELECT es1.*, p.Ac.vity, p.Gender, p.DiversityCode, p.NwaId FROM #EventSubject es1 INNER join #PROSPECT_DIVERSITY p ON es1.subjectId = p.ProspectId INNER JOIN #ACTIVITIES a ON a.Ac.vity = p.Ac.vity inner join RSSOSS.USMC.EventOutcome oc on es1.EventId = oc.EventId WHERE oc.InterviewOutcomeId IN (1,2) and Program in ('0A', '0B', '0C', '0E', '0F', '1A', '1B', '1C', '1H') and eventypeid in (1,85,88) AND SocialSecurityNumber IS NULL )
UNION ALL
( -- for applicants with SSN SELECT es1.*, p.Ac.vity, p.Gender, p.DiversityCode, p.NwaId FROM #EventSubject es1 INNER JOIN #PROSPECT_DIVERSITY p ON es1.subjectId = p.ProspectId INNER JOIN #ACTIVITIES a ON a.Ac.vity = p.Ac.vity INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventOutcome oc on es1.EventId = oc.EventId WHERE oc.InterviewOutcomeId IN (1,2) and StartDate = ( SELECT min(es2.StartDate) FROM #EventSubject2 es2 INNER JOIN #PROSPECT_DIVERSITY p2 on es2.subjectId = p2.ProspectId INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventOutcome oc2 on es2.EventId = oc2.EventId WHERE p.SocialSecurityNumber = p2.SocialSecurityNumber and p.Program = p2.Program and p.Program in ('1E') and es2.startDate between @StartCompDate and @EndDate and es1.eventypeid = es2.eventypeid and oc2.InterviewOutcomeId IN (1,2) and es1.EventId in ( SELECT id FROM #Event WHERE eventypeid in (1,85,88) ) )
UNION
-- for applicants without SSN SELECT es1.*, p.Ac.vity, p.Gender, p.DiversityCode, p.NwaId FROM #EventSubject es1 INNER join #PROSPECT_DIVERSITY p ON es1.subjectId = p.ProspectId INNER JOIN #ACTIVITIES a ON a.Ac.vity = p.Ac.vity inner join RSSOSS.USMC.EventOutcome oc on es1.EventId = oc.EventId WHERE oc.InterviewOutcomeId IN (1,2) and Program in ('1E') and eventypeid in (1,85,88) AND SocialSecurityNumber IS NULL ) ) rst
-- select * from #EventSubjectInt
INSERT INTO #RESULTS SELECT p.Ac.vity AS ActType ,0 AS ContactCount ,0 AS ContactCount_Female ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) as AppCount ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1 AND p.Gender = 'F' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) as AppCount_Female ,0 AS IntviewCount --,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN oc.InterviewOutcomeId IN (1,2) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS IntviewCount ,0 AS IntviewCount_Female --,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN oc.InterviewOutcomeId IN (1,2) AND p.Gender = 'F' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS IntviewCount_Female ,0 AS NwaCount ,0 AS NwaCount_Female ,0 AS ContactCountAA ,0 AS ContactCountAA_Female ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1 AND p.DiversityCode = 'AA' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) as AppCountAA ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1 AND p.DiversityCode = 'AA' AND p.Gender = 'F' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) as AppCountAA_Female ,0 AS IntviewCountAA--,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN oc.InterviewOutcomeId IN (1,2) AND p.DiversityCode = 'AA' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS IntviewCountAA ,0 AS IntviewCountAA_Female --,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN oc.InterviewOutcomeId IN (1,2) AND p.DiversityCode = 'AA' AND p.Gender = 'F' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS IntviewCountAA_Female ,0 AS NwaCountAA ,0 AS NwaCountAA_Female ,0 AS ContactCountWhite ,0 AS ContactCountWhite_Female ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1 AND p.DiversityCode = 'W' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) as AppCountWhite ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1 AND p.DiversityCode = 'W' AND p.Gender = 'F' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) as AppCountWhite_Female ,0 AS IntviewCountWhite --,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN oc.InterviewOutcomeId IN (1,2) AND p.DiversityCode = 'W' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS IntviewCountWhite ,0 AS IntviewCountWhite_Female --,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN oc.InterviewOutcomeId IN (1,2) AND p.DiversityCode = 'W' AND p.Gender = 'F' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS IntviewCountWhite_Female ,0 AS NwaCountWhite ,0 AS NwaCountWhite_Female ,0 AS ContactCountH ,0 AS ContactCountH_Female ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1 AND p.DiversityCode = 'H' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) as AppCountH ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1 AND p.DiversityCode = 'H' AND p.Gender = 'F' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) as AppCountH_Female ,0 IntviewCountH --ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN oc.InterviewOutcomeId IN (1,2) AND p.DiversityCode = 'H' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS IntviewCountH ,0 IntviewCountH_Female --ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN oc.InterviewOutcomeId IN (1,2) AND p.DiversityCode = 'H' AND p.Gender = 'F' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS IntviewCountH_Female ,0 AS NwaCountH ,0 AS NwaCountH_Female ,0 AS ContactCountO ,0 AS ContactCountO_Female ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1 AND p.DiversityCode = 'O' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) as AppCountO ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN e.EventSourceId = 1 and e.EventTypeId = 1 AND p.DiversityCode = 'O' AND p.Gender = 'F' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) as AppCountO_Female ,0 IntviewCountO --ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN oc.InterviewOutcomeId IN (1,2) AND p.DiversityCode = 'O' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS IntviewCountO ,0 IntviewCountO_Female --ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN oc.InterviewOutcomeId IN (1,2) AND p.DiversityCode = 'O' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS IntviewCountO_Female ,0 AS NwaCountO ,0 AS NwaCountO_Female FROM #Event e INNER JOIN #EventSubject s ON e.ID = s.EventId Right OUTER JOIN #PROSPECT_DIVERSITY p ON s.subjectId = p.ProspectId INNER JOIN #ACTIVITIES a ON a.Ac.vity = p.Ac.vity LEFT OUTER JOIN #EventOutcome oc ON e.ID = oc.EventId GROUP BY p.Ac.vity
update #Results set IntviewCount = rst.cnt from (SELECT COUNT(*) cnt, Ac.vity FROM #EventSubjectInt group by Ac.vity) rst inner join #Results rt on rt.ActType = rst.Ac.vity
update #Results set IntviewCount_Female =rst.cnt from (SELECT COUNT(*) cnt, Ac.vity FROM #EventSubjectInt where Gender = 'F' group by Ac.vity) rst inner join #Results rt on rt.ActType = rst.Ac.vity
update #Results set IntviewCountAA = rst.cnt from (SELECT COUNT(*) cnt, Ac.vity FROM #EventSubjectInt where DiversityCode = 'AA' group by Ac.vity) rst inner join #Results rt on rt.ActType = rst.Ac.vity
update #Results set IntviewCountAA_Female =rst.cnt from (SELECT COUNT(*) cnt, Ac.vity FROM #EventSubjectInt where Gender = 'F' and DiversityCode = 'AA' group by Ac.vity) rst inner join #Results rt on rt.ActType = rst.Ac.vity
update #Results set IntviewCountWhite = rst.cnt from (SELECT COUNT(*) cnt, Ac.vity FROM #EventSubjectInt where DiversityCode = 'W' group by Ac.vity) rst inner join #Results rt on rt.ActType = rst.Ac.vity
update #Results set IntviewCountWhite_Female =rst.cnt from (SELECT COUNT(*) cnt, Ac.vity FROM #EventSubjectInt where Gender = 'F' and DiversityCode = 'W' group by Ac.vity) rst inner join #Results rt on rt.ActType = rst.Ac.vity
update #Results set IntviewCountH = rst.cnt from (SELECT COUNT(*) cnt, Ac.vity FROM #EventSubjectInt where DiversityCode = 'H' group by Ac.vity) rst inner join #Results rt on rt.ActType = rst.Ac.vity
update #Results set IntviewCountH_Female =rst.cnt from (SELECT COUNT(*) cnt, Ac.vity FROM #EventSubjectInt where Gender = 'F' and DiversityCode = 'H' group by Ac.vity) rst inner join #Results rt on rt.ActType = rst.Ac.vity
update #Results set IntviewCountO = rst.cnt from (SELECT COUNT(*) cnt, Ac.vity FROM #EventSubjectInt where DiversityCode = 'O' group by Ac.vity) rst inner join #Results rt on rt.ActType = rst.Ac.vity
update #Results set IntviewCountO_Female =rst.cnt from (SELECT COUNT(*) cnt, Ac.vity FROM #EventSubjectInt where Gender = 'F' and DiversityCode = 'O' group by Ac.vity) rst inner join #Results rt on rt.ActType = rst.Ac.vity
UPDATE #RESULTS SET ContactCount = ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #PROSPECT_DIVERSITY p WHERE p.Ac.vityDate >= @StartDate AND p.Ac.vityDate < @EndDate AND p.Ac.vity = 'TC'),0) ,ContactCount_Female = ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #PROSPECT_DIVERSITY p WHERE p.Ac.vityDate >= @StartDate AND p.Ac.vityDate < @EndDate AND p.Ac.vity = 'TC' AND p.Gender = 'F'),0) ,ContactCountAA = ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #PROSPECT_DIVERSITY p WHERE p.Ac.vityDate >= @StartDate AND p.Ac.vityDate < @EndDate AND p.Ac.vity = 'TC' AND p.DiversityCode = 'AA'),0) ,ContactCountAA_Female = ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #PROSPECT_DIVERSITY p WHERE p.Ac.vityDate >= @StartDate AND p.Ac.vityDate < @EndDate AND p.Ac.vity = 'TC' AND p.DiversityCode = 'AA' AND p.Gender = 'F'),0) ,ContactCountWhite = ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #PROSPECT_DIVERSITY p WHERE p.Ac.vityDate >= @StartDate AND p.Ac.vityDate < @EndDate AND p.Ac.vity = 'TC' AND p.DiversityCode = 'W'),0) ,ContactCountWhite_Female = ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #PROSPECT_DIVERSITY p WHERE p.Ac.vityDate >= @StartDate AND p.Ac.vityDate < @EndDate AND p.Ac.vity = 'TC' AND p.DiversityCode = 'W' AND p.Gender = 'F'),0) ,ContactCountH = ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #PROSPECT_DIVERSITY p WHERE p.Ac.vityDate >= @StartDate AND p.Ac.vityDate < @EndDate AND p.Ac.vity = 'TC' AND p.DiversityCode = 'H'),0) ,ContactCountH_Female = ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #PROSPECT_DIVERSITY p WHERE p.Ac.vityDate >= @StartDate AND p.Ac.vityDate < @EndDate AND p.Ac.vity = 'TC' AND p.DiversityCode = 'H' AND p.Gender = 'F'),0) ,ContactCountO = ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #PROSPECT_DIVERSITY p WHERE p.Ac.vityDate >= @StartDate AND p.Ac.vityDate < @EndDate AND p.Ac.vity = 'TC' AND p.DiversityCode = 'O'),0) ,ContactCountO_Female = ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #PROSPECT_DIVERSITY p WHERE p.Ac.vityDate >= @StartDate AND p.Ac.vityDate < @EndDate AND p.Ac.vity = 'TC' AND p.DiversityCode = 'O' AND p.Gender = 'F'),0)
,NwaCount = ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #EventSubjectInt p WHERE p.Ac.vity = 'TC' AND p.NwaId is not null),0) ,NwaCount_Female = ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #EventSubjectInt p WHERE p.Ac.vity = 'TC' AND p.NwaId is not null AND p.Gender = 'F'),0) ,NwaCountAA = ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #EventSubjectInt p WHERE p.Ac.vity = 'TC' AND p.NwaId is not null AND p.DiversityCode = 'AA'),0) ,NwaCountAA_Female = ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #EventSubjectInt p WHERE p.Ac.vity = 'TC' AND p.NwaId is not null AND p.DiversityCode = 'AA' AND p.Gender = 'F'),0) ,NwaCountWhite = ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #EventSubjectInt p WHERE p.Ac.vity = 'TC' AND p.NwaId is not null AND p.DiversityCode = 'W'),0) ,NwaCountWhite_Female = ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #EventSubjectInt p WHERE p.Ac.vity = 'TC' AND p.NwaId is not null AND p.DiversityCode = 'W' AND p.Gender = 'F'),0) ,NwaCountH = ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #EventSubjectInt p WHERE p.Ac.vity = 'TC' AND p.NwaId is not null AND p.DiversityCode = 'H'),0) ,NwaCountH_Female = ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #EventSubjectInt p WHERE p.Ac.vity = 'TC' AND p.NwaId is not null AND p.DiversityCode = 'H' AND p.Gender = 'F'),0) ,NwaCountO = ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #EventSubjectInt p WHERE p.Ac.vity = 'TC' AND p.NwaId is not null AND p.DiversityCode = 'O'),0) ,NwaCountO_Female = ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #EventSubjectInt p WHERE p.Ac.vity = 'TC' AND p.NwaId is not null AND p.DiversityCode = 'O' AND p.Gender = 'F'),0) WHERE ActType = 'TC'
UPDATE #RESULTS SET ContactCount = ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #PROSPECT_DIVERSITY p WHERE p.Ac.vityDate >= @StartDate AND p.Ac.vityDate < @EndDate AND p.Ac.vity = 'DC'),0) ,ContactCount_Female = ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #PROSPECT_DIVERSITY p WHERE p.Ac.vityDate >= @StartDate AND p.Ac.vityDate < @EndDate AND p.Ac.vity = 'DC' AND p.Gender = 'F'),0) ,ContactCountAA = ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #PROSPECT_DIVERSITY p WHERE p.Ac.vityDate >= @StartDate AND p.Ac.vityDate < @EndDate AND p.Ac.vity = 'DC' AND p.DiversityCode = 'AA'),0) ,ContactCountAA_Female = ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #PROSPECT_DIVERSITY p WHERE p.Ac.vityDate >= @StartDate AND p.Ac.vityDate < @EndDate AND p.Ac.vity = 'DC' AND p.DiversityCode = 'AA' AND p.Gender = 'F'),0) ,ContactCountWhite = ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #PROSPECT_DIVERSITY p WHERE p.Ac.vityDate >= @StartDate AND p.Ac.vityDate < @EndDate AND p.Ac.vity = 'DC' AND p.DiversityCode = 'W'),0) ,ContactCountWhite_Female = ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #PROSPECT_DIVERSITY p WHERE p.Ac.vityDate >= @StartDate AND p.Ac.vityDate < @EndDate AND p.Ac.vity = 'DC' AND p.DiversityCode = 'W' AND p.Gender = 'F'),0) ,ContactCountH = ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #PROSPECT_DIVERSITY p WHERE p.Ac.vityDate >= @StartDate AND p.Ac.vityDate < @EndDate AND p.Ac.vity = 'DC' AND p.DiversityCode = 'H'),0) ,ContactCountH_Female = ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #PROSPECT_DIVERSITY p WHERE p.Ac.vityDate >= @StartDate AND p.Ac.vityDate < @EndDate AND p.Ac.vity = 'DC' AND p.DiversityCode = 'H' AND p.Gender = 'F'),0) ,ContactCountO = ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #PROSPECT_DIVERSITY p WHERE p.Ac.vityDate >= @StartDate AND p.Ac.vityDate < @EndDate AND p.Ac.vity = 'DC' AND p.DiversityCode = 'O'),0) ,ContactCountO_Female = ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #PROSPECT_DIVERSITY p WHERE p.Ac.vityDate >= @StartDate AND p.Ac.vityDate < @EndDate AND p.Ac.vity = 'DC' AND p.DiversityCode = 'O' AND p.Gender = 'F'),0) ,NwaCount = ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #EventSubjectInt p WHERE p.Ac.vity = 'DC' AND p.NwaId is not null),0) ,NwaCount_Female = ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #EventSubjectInt p WHERE p.Ac.vity = 'DC' AND p.NwaId is not null AND p.Gender = 'F'),0) ,NwaCountAA = ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #EventSubjectInt p WHERE p.Ac.vity = 'DC' AND p.NwaId is not null AND p.DiversityCode = 'AA'),0) ,NwaCountAA_Female = ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #EventSubjectInt p WHERE p.Ac.vity = 'DC' AND p.NwaId is not null AND p.DiversityCode = 'AA' AND p.Gender = 'F'),0) ,NwaCountWhite = ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #EventSubjectInt p WHERE p.Ac.vity = 'DC' AND p.NwaId is not null AND p.DiversityCode = 'W'),0) ,NwaCountWhite_Female = ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #EventSubjectInt p WHERE p.Ac.vity = 'DC' AND p.NwaId is not null AND p.DiversityCode = 'W' AND p.Gender = 'F'),0) ,NwaCountH = ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #EventSubjectInt p WHERE p.Ac.vity = 'DC' AND p.NwaId is not null AND p.DiversityCode = 'H'),0) ,NwaCountH_Female = ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #EventSubjectInt p WHERE p.Ac.vity = 'DC' AND p.NwaId is not null AND p.DiversityCode = 'H' AND p.Gender = 'F'),0) ,NwaCountO = ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #EventSubjectInt p WHERE p.Ac.vity = 'DC' AND p.NwaId is not null AND p.DiversityCode = 'O'),0) ,NwaCountO_Female = ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #EventSubjectInt p WHERE p.Ac.vity = 'DC' AND p.NwaId is not null AND p.DiversityCode = 'O' AND p.Gender = 'F'),0) WHERE ActType = 'DC'
UPDATE #RESULTS SET ContactCount = ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #PROSPECT_DIVERSITY p WHERE p.Ac.vityDate >= @StartDate AND p.Ac.vityDate < @EndDate and p.Ac.vity = 'AC'),0) ,ContactCount_Female = ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #PROSPECT_DIVERSITY p WHERE p.Ac.vityDate >= @StartDate AND p.Ac.vityDate < @EndDate AND p.Ac.vity = 'AC' AND p.Gender = 'F'),0) ,ContactCountAA = ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #PROSPECT_DIVERSITY p WHERE p.Ac.vityDate >= @StartDate AND p.Ac.vityDate < @EndDate AND p.Ac.vity = 'AC' AND p.DiversityCode = 'AA'),0) ,ContactCountAA_Female = ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #PROSPECT_DIVERSITY p WHERE p.Ac.vityDate >= @StartDate AND p.Ac.vityDate < @EndDate AND p.Ac.vity = 'AC' AND p.DiversityCode = 'AA' AND p.Gender = 'F'),0) ,ContactCountWhite = ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #PROSPECT_DIVERSITY p WHERE p.Ac.vityDate >= @StartDate AND p.Ac.vityDate < @EndDate AND p.Ac.vity = 'AC' AND p.DiversityCode = 'W'),0) ,ContactCountWhite_Female = ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #PROSPECT_DIVERSITY p WHERE p.Ac.vityDate >= @StartDate AND p.Ac.vityDate < @EndDate AND p.Ac.vity = 'AC' AND p.DiversityCode = 'W' AND p.Gender = 'F'),0) ,ContactCountH = ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #PROSPECT_DIVERSITY p WHERE p.Ac.vityDate >= @StartDate AND p.Ac.vityDate < @EndDate AND p.Ac.vity = 'AC' AND p.DiversityCode = 'H'),0) ,ContactCountH_Female = ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM #PROSPECT_DIVERSITY p WHERE p.Ac.vityDate >= @StartDate AND p.Ac.vityDate < @EndDate AND p.Ac.vity = 'AC' AND p.DiversityCode = 'H' AND p.Gender = 'F'),0) ,ContactCountO = ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM
